item.title: Weapon Mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wookiee)
item.dc:creator: Wookiee
item.content:encoded:
This afternoon I came up with an idea for a weapon mutator. On random botpaths spawn realistic items such as -

trashcans
yard clippers
shovels
hoes (get your mind out of the gutter! )
tires
etc.

-that you can throw at or bludgeon other players with. It would add a lot of fun/madness to ordinary maps, and would help out if you couldn't find your own weapon (It would probably work best in outdoor maps).

item.title: Translocator Mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com (Editor_n00b)
item.dc:creator: Editor_n00b
item.content:encoded:
Being not-so-skilled at Unreal Tournament, I can't stand people who can translocate here, there, everywhere, and then next thing you know they've riddled you so full of holes you can't stand up anymore. How do they do that? How do they rapidly translocate here and there and fill you full of holes at the same time?

This got me to thinking...doesn't the translocater make your mind go crazy? Isn't constant usage supposed to fry your brain and make you insane?

And so, after thinking...

Translocator Mutator
